title: Impact of Article Language in Multi-Language Medical Journal
author: Torsten Diekhoff; Peter Schlattmann; Marc Dewey
description: Background: In times of globalization there is an increasing use of English in the medical literature. The aim of this study was to analyze the influence of English-language articles in multi-language
